project.name: Direct Air Capture Plant
project.description: Deploy a modular DAC facility capable of scaling with learning-by-doing cost reductions.
project.coBenefits: High-quality jobs in clean technology manufacturing hubs.

project.name: Landfill Methane Oxidation
project.description: Install modular oxidation covers for legacy landfills across multiple municipalities.
project.coBenefits: Improved local air quality and odor control for surrounding communities.

project.name: Mangrove Restoration Programme
project.description: Restore and protect coastal mangrove ecosystems with community stewardship.
project.coBenefits: Storm surge protection and fisheries habitat co-benefits for coastal residents.
